notes:
### Added
- Current stable release of CLI: GRID RUNNER
- Complete TRON-inspired 3D speedrun game
- First-person perspective with dynamic path navigation
- Combat system with discs, towers, and recognizers
- Arena system with dynamic wall construction
- Health and damage system with visual feedback
- Three difficulty levels with progressive challenge
- Speedrun mode with local leaderboard
- 3D holographic minimap with real-time updates
- Comprehensive audio system with positional effects

### Technical Features
- Built with Tauri v2 for cross-platform desktop deployment
- React 19 frontend with TypeScript for type safety
- Three.js v0.169.0 for high-performance 3D rendering
- Modular architecture with 30+ focused modules
- Comprehensive property-based testing suite
- Performance optimizations including material caching and instanced rendering

### Platforms
- Windows (x64)
- macOS (Intel and Apple Silicon)
- Linux (x64 AppImage)
